title: The Pandumbic - Americans Balk at Trump's Vaccine Talk | Malcolm Gladwell & Lamorne Morris
itunes:title: The Pandumbic - Americans Balk at Trump's Vaccine Talk | Malcolm Gladwell & Lamorne Morris
description:
Trevor covers the latest in coronavirus news, Malcolm Gladwell discusses his podcast "Revisionist History," and comedian Lamorne Morris talks about his Hulu series "Woke."
